title: Pearson publishes new learning objectives to help international students studying English (Pearson plc)
text: ( Source : Pearson plc ) Collaboration with 6, 000 teachers from over 50 countries creates a new framework for Academic English proficiency Students required to develop their English proficiency in order to win a place in an English speaking
